#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
int main()
{
    long int tcase;
    scanf("%ld",&tcase);
    while(tcase--)
    {
        long long int l,ans;
        scanf("%lld",&l);
        ans=(-3+sqrt(9+l));
        if(ans==0)
        printf("-1\n");
        else
        printf("%lld\n",ans+1);
    }
	return 0;
}
